body.para: I just installed a KDE application on Ubuntu. Of course it required a big pile of KDE libraries and other packages.
Suppose I want to uninstall that application, is there an easy way of getting rid of all those packages it depended upon?
Or in other words, would it be possible to set/save the current state of all installed packages, and then roll back to that savepoint?
